name: United Cerebral Palsy Association of the Golden Gate
description: Accepts donations of clothing, housewares, furniture, electronics, and vehicles; free pickup available; proceeds support services for people with developmental disabilities
fullDescription: United Cerebral Palsy Association of the Golden Gate accepts donations of household items and vehicles, with proceeds supporting services for people with developmental disabilities.
whatTheyOffer:
- Accept clothing and housewares
- Accept furniture and electronics
- Accept vehicle donations
- Free pickup available
- Proceeds support disability services
- Items help Bay Area residents
howToGetIt:
1. Contact UCPA Golden Gate
2. Schedule free pickup
3. Donate household items or vehicles
4. Pickup arranged at your convenience
5. Support disability programs
6. Get donation receipt for taxes
keywords: UCPA, United Cerebral Palsy, donate car, vehicle donation, donate furniture, donate clothes, free pickup, developmental disabilities, household donation
